titleStmt.title: The arraignement, iudgement, confession, and execution of Humfrey Stafford gentleman Who on the tenth of this present month of Iune, 1607. suffered, at Saint Thomas of Waterings.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for A. J[ohnson] and F. B[urton] & are to be solde at the signe of the Flower-de-Luce and Crowne in Paules Church-yarde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
